text: Kolokoltsevo () is a rural locality (a village) in Nikolayevsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 22 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 35 km from Ufa, 6 km from Nikolayevka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Kolokoltsevo
